Description: FREE SHIPPING TO THE "LOWER 48"!CHECK OUT OUR SUPERB FEEDBACK FOR YOURSELF!CALL FOR A HANDS ON DESCRIPTION OF ALL OF OUR INSTRUMENTS!Guitars West, Inc. The Ultracure Robert Smith Signature Model Electric Guitar is a well-made, well-equipped guitar with a unique look that might be called "sophisticated Goth." Designed by the professionals at Schecter with input from The Cure's famous singer/songwriter, it features a mahogany body, 25-1/2"-scale set neck, pearl moon and star inlays on a rosewood fingerboard, Grover tuners, Seymour Duncan '59 humbuckers, TonePros TOM bridge system, and chrome hardware. Cool look. Great hardware. Hot sound. Mahogany body with raised center25-1/2" scale set-in, 3-piece neck Rosewood fingerboard with pearl moon and star inlays 24 jumbo frets Seymour Duncan '59 humbuckers TonePros TOM system Grover tuners Chrome hardware Master volume control Master tone The guitar weighs approximately 9lbs 3oz, the nut measures 1 11/16" with a fretboard radius of 10". The condition of our guitar is good. There are a few small, superficial scuffs in the lacquer but nothing to write home about. This guitar comes with a gig bag. In our 30+ years of business, Customer Service has always been of the utmost importance to us. Every call, email and inquiry will be answered. We are happy to offer full descriptions of condition and sound of all of our instruments to the best of our expertise. PLEASE NOTE: All sales are final, as we have a No Return Policy. Title: Schecter Guitar Research Diamond Series Ultracure Robert Smith Signature Model
